```{r setup, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(GimmeMyPlot)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(magrittr)
set.seed(0)
```

## Venn diagrams
```{r venn}
x <- lapply(
    seq(3),
    function(x) {
        runif(10, 1, 10) %>%
            round() %>%
            letters[.] %>%
            unique() %>%
            paste("Element", .)
    }
) %>%
    set_names(paste("Dataset", LETTERS[seq(3)]))

# Default parameters
plot_venn_diagram(x)
```

```{r venn_adv, fig.width = 5}
# Advanced parameters
plot_venn_diagram(
    x,
    width_label = 5,
    colour = brewer.pal(3, "Reds"),
    color_gradient = c("white", "red"),
    cex = 1.2,
    cex_main = 1.2 * 6,
    n_max = 2,
    vjust_label = 0.75,
    ratio = 0.2
)

plot_venn_diagram(
    x,
    width_text = 8,
    width_label = 5,
    colour = brewer.pal(3, "Reds"),
    cex = 1.2,
    cex_main = 1.2 * 6,
    n_max = 2,
    vjust_label = 0.75,
    ratio = 0.5,
    label = FALSE,
    element = FALSE,
    percent = FALSE
)
```
